About.title: About me
About.paragraph1: As a passionate fullstack developer, I combine technical expertise with creative design. My focus is on developing applications that are not only functional, but also intuitive and accessible.
About.paragraph2: With several years of experience in modern web technologies, I develop tailored solutions that meet my clients' individual requirements.

items.title: This Portfolio
items.description: Fully featured fullstack portfolio with CI/CD, automated deployment via Docker Swarm and Traefik. Frontend in Next.js + TypeScript with i18n, dark/light mode and motion animations. Backend in Express with Zod validation, Nodemailer and rate limiting. Completely open source.

items.title: Homelab & Private Cloud
items.description: Hybrid Cloud System Architecture & DevOps Lab. Fully automated cluster (on-prem & cloud) based on Docker Swarm and Ansible. Secured through a zero-trust strategy (Netbird, Keycloak) and monitored by a modern observability stack (Prometheus, Loki, Wazuh). Design focus: Maximum maintainability with minimal operational costs.

items.title: Phoenix MasterTag
items.description: Modular tracking container for 200+ advertisers. Introduced architecture modernization, Git standards and CI/CD. Scaled to >50 million requests per month.
